title: What is Stenography? Typing at 200+ WPM
description: Ever wondered how court reporters type so fast? An introduction to stenography and how you can learn it with a regular keyboard.
author: Free Online Typing Team
content:
Chording

Unlike regular typing, steno involves pressing multiple keys simultaneously (chords) to output syllables or whole words.

Plover

Plover is free open-source software that lets you use a standard keyboard (with N-key rollover) to learn steno. It's a steep learning curve but offers the highest potential typing speeds.
